title: 'My Hair Loves this Shampoo!'
body: 'My Hair loves this Shampoo it cleans so well no matter how oily your hair is and the best part it does not strip off the moisture from the hair! The hair is soft manageable even without using conditioner.'

title: 'Good shampoo but with chemicals'
body: Trusted brand Dabur and tried the shampoo. It has really yielded good results. It leaves the hair smooth and silky, eases the curls, smells good too. Now our entire family has shifted to it. Ed: Just after using the shampoo for a week I noticed that the hair colour was fading quickly. Then following a little study found that this shampoo has chemicals that may cause damage to the hair in the long run. So please don't get carried away by the initial impressive hair wash experience and use discretion.
